jobTitle: Security Data Analyst ( Big Data Tech Analyst)

companyInfo.Competitors: Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Toyota North America

jobDescription: FCA is seeking an experienced Security Data Analyst to be part of the FCA Security Team providing in-depth analysis of collected data for strategic planning and creation of real-time data models used for generating Key Performance Indicators (KPI) and other metric reporting. Essential Functions:Perform data analysis on security related data to meet cybersecurity reporting and analytical needsWork with source system owners to setup data feeds for ingestion into the analytical systemsApply data governance and statistical principles to creation and presentation of informationDevelop automated reports and dynamic and static dashboards to support security department operations
